mapper.select: SELECT r.ID AS id, r.ROLECODE AS rolecode, r.ROLENAME AS rolename, r.GROUPID AS groupid, r.`STATUS` AS STATUS, r.REMARK AS remark, r.SYSTEMID AS systemId, r.CREATETIME AS createtime, r.UPDATETIME AS updatetime, r.CREATOR AS creator, r.UPDATER AS updater, g.GROUPNAME AS groupname, s.SYSNAME AS systemname FROM r_role r LEFT JOIN r_role_group g ON r.GROUPID = g.ID LEFT JOIN r_accesssystem s ON r.SYSTEMID = s.ID

SELECT r.ID AS id, r.ROLECODE AS rolecode, r.ROLENAME AS rolename, r.GROUPID AS groupid, r.`STATUS` AS STATUS, r.REMARK AS remark, r.SYSTEMID AS systemId, r.CREATETIME AS createtime, r.UPDATETIME AS updatetime, r.CREATOR AS creator, r.UPDATER AS updater, IF(ur.USERID IS NOT NULL AND ur.USERID>0, 'true', 'false') AS checked FROM R_ROLE r LEFT JOIN R_USER_ROLE ur ON ( r.ID = ur.ROLEID AND ur.USERID = #{userid} )
SELECT r.* FROM r_role r, r_user_role ur WHERE ur.USERID = #{userid} AND ur.ROLEID = r.ID AND r.SYSTEMID = #{systemid}
mapper.update: UPDATE r_role SET GROUPID=0 WHERE GROUPID=#{groupId}
